item.description: We are taking registrations for our training program again this Saturday morning, or online through the end of the month. If you haven't registered, but still want to, there's plenty of time! This SAturday we will do our first seminar prior to our group run. Topic: Hydration. We will also raffle off some great Amphipod gear.

group.name: Boston Fit Marathon, Half Marathon, and Triathlon Training

item.name: Boston Fit Marathon/Half marathon training program, Week #2
